data.fullContent: In order to keep your air conditioner running at optimal efficiency, you should set up a maintenance plan. A good maintenance plan will have your air conditioner checked for issues before they become a problem. If you wait until your air conditioner breaks and then try to fix it, you'll probably end up spending a lot more money than if you just had it checked in the first place. It is worth the time and the money to complete these preventative repairs so there isn't a major problem. If your air conditioner breaks and you don't get it fixed, you'll be stuck having to use a window unit in the meantime, and those are not very efficient.
